markdownRemark.html: I use a computer to code. I use code available in github as open-source. I use a smartphone to aid me in my studies. I watch a lot of free courses in YouTube. I use my profession as an accountant to earn money. I use money to fund my experiments. I use my favorite coffe cup to drink coffee without sugar. I use the television to bond with my mom. I don’t watch the news.
